title: Before and after you leave Australia
summary: This page provides guidance for individuals leaving Australia, including tax implications when selling property, steps to take before departure, and how to access superannuation after leaving the country. It outlines programs for assistance, warnings about conflict zones, and detailed steps to claim Departing Australia Superannuation Payment (DASP).

cgt_main_residence_exemption.pre_2017_rule: Foreign residents who had been Australian residents could claim the CGT main residence exemption when selling Australian residential property.
